short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds and copies bolded text on Google search result pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Bold Text SERP Grabber is a simple chrome extension.
All it does is copy the bold text on a Google search result.

To use this plugin simply go to a Google search and click on the extension in the top right of your browser window to activate it.

A window will pop up and show the bold text.
You can then click the button to copy the bold text to your clipboard.
